mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_ORDER ( KONUM, KPNUM, KPID, KPNAME, KPCNT, KPPRICE, KPPRICESUM KMNUM, KMID, KMNAME, KMHP, KMEMAIL, KODEIVARY, KOZONE, KOROAD, KOROAD2, KOJIBUN DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{konum}, #{kpnum}, #{kpid}, #{kpname}, #{kpcnt}, #{kpprice}, #{kppricesum}, #{kmnum}, #{kmid}, #{kmname}, #{kmhp}, #{kmemail}, #{kodelivery}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
